title: Howard Stern Sternthology (20 Years Of Sal) pt1
description:
Howard Stern Sternthology (20 Years Of Sal) APR 25 2016 Mon (02:52:51)

* Gary Gets Revenge â€“ Howard & Gary finally get revenge on Sal by offering him a fake job on the Stern Show. (01/29/98)

* Bamboozled By Booey â€“ A special bonus segment!  A radio drama cut for time from last yearâ€™s Halloween special featuring Gary, Sal & Sour Shoes acting out an Edgar Allan Poe horror classic.  Gary seeks the ultimate revenge against his long-time tormentor, Sal
